STUDENT LEAVE APPLICATION
14-09-2025
Coimbatore
From:
RUTHISHKUMAR G
Roll Number: 71812353045
Department of MTECH CSE
Sri Ramakrishna Engineering College,
Coimbatore-641022
To:
The Head of the Department,
Department of MTECH CSE,
Sri Ramakrishna Engineering College,
Coimbatore-641022
Respected Sir/Madam,
Sub: Request for leave from 2025-09-15 to 2025-09-18
I kindly request you to grant me leave from 2025-09-15 to 2025-09-18 due to etd cy cdiq w k eec sc. I assure you that I will
complete all my pending work and responsibilities once I resume. I hope for your kind consideration and approval of my leave request.
Thank You
Yours Sincerely,
RUTHISHKUMAR G
